Description:
Impressive Inside - Amazing Outside
Amazing outside spaces complimented by a much loved and cared for interior combine to offer the perfect family friendly residence. A superb open plan kitchen overlooks the large dining and main living area and provides access and views of the magnificent backyard highlighted by an enormous pergola which is perfect for outside entertaining or doubles as a great undercover storage area for a boat or caravan by utilising the rear roller door access of the double remote garage. A separate lounge/theatre room, luxurious master suite featuring dual WIRs, double vanity and double shower ensuite , and 3 additional bedrooms with mirrored BIRs serviced by a lovely central bathroom with spa complete the home. Other features include ducted heating, 2 reverse cycle air conditioners, brand new carpets, alarm, 900mm appliances and dishwasher in kitchen, 2 outdoor sheds, 14,000 litre water tank, huge backyard (approx. 640sqm allotment) with a cubby house that the kids will love, vegetable patch for the keen gardener, artificial grass and mature hedges that provide privacy from neighbours . All this in a prized location walking distance to all amenities.
Insights: 14 Edinburgh Way, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Surrounded by other quality homes and being the only home ever offered for sale in this tightly held street is this exceptional Derrimut residence. Perfectly presented and maintained, the property comprises 4 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite complimented by great sized kitchen, dining and living spaces. Moving outside is a lovely pergola area for those that enjoy outside entertaining and a large low maintenance backyard with extensive artificial grass, storage shed and vegetable patch. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality bathrooms with floor to ceiling tiles, designer lighting, alarm, landscaped front and rear gardens, double driveway and double garage with remote and internal access. With everything already done for you just move in and enjoy.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU- 7 OFFERS IN 1 WEEK
Only through inspection will you truly appreciate the effort and love that has gone into this fantastic Metricon built residence. An absolute credit to its current owners this home exudes warmth and comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs with the huge master offering a WIR and ensuite. A lovely kitchen featuring walk in pantry, 900mm appliances & premium quality Bosch dishwasher overlooks the dining and main living area with timber French doors leading out to the huge decked pergola area and backyard space. Completing the home is a central main bathroom and separate lounge that can also be used as a study or easily converted into a 4th bedroom to suit any buyers particular requirements. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, monitored alarm system, top of the range solar panel system (huge savings at 68 cents per watt instead of the current 6 cents per watt), floor to ceiling tiles in both bathrooms, a mixture of timber flooring and quality carpets, upgraded window furnishings including plantation shutters , LED down lights, landscaped gardens and double garage remote with rear and internal access.
Insights: 36 Carew Way, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
Instant Attraction!
A rare opportunity to secure this large 4 bedroom family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 15 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move. Comprising four generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR & en-suite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and two separate living areas, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted outside entertaining area, with a spacious rear yard, boasting 437m2 (approx.) of land in total. Landscaped gardens front to rear, stone kitchen bench tops, gas ducted heating, cooling, intercom and remote DLUG are a few of the many extras available. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Don't delay and call today!

Masterfully designed to reveal luxurious family surroundings, this impeccably presented home offers generously proportioned interiors and inviting outdoor spaces. Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT
That perfect residence we all dream about but can never find, is finally on the market. Positive first impressions are assured with the striking facade providing great street appeal. Upon entering the ultra modern interior will amaze and have you saying maybe, then the clincher will come once you reach the magnificent outdoor entertainment area that will just blow you away and have you screaming YES. The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, master with WIR and double vanity ensuite with oversize shower, upgraded kitchen with 40mm stone benches, glass splashback, 900mm appliances and huge walk in pantry that overlooks the dining and main living area. Other features include separate study, lounge/theatre room, games/rumpus area, ducted heating, stone benches in bathrooms, down lights, high ceilings, alarm, plantation shutters, security cameras, landscaped front and rear gardens and double garage with remote and internal access. For those that like the finer things in life, the time has come to spoil yourself.

Description:
Generous Family Living!
A rare opportunity to secure this large 4 bedroom family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 15 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move. Comprising four generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR & en-suite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and two separate living areas, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted outside entertaining area, with a spacious rear yard, boasting 400m2 (approx.) of land in total. Landscaped gardens front to rear, stone kitchen bench tops, gas ducted heating, cooling, intercom and remote DLUG are a few of the many extras available. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Do not delay and call today!

Description:
Pristine and Peaceful Modern Pad
Immaculately presented and awash in brilliant natural light, this classy three bedroom home will have you enjoying a sensational modern lifestyle. On a single level and graced with a wonderfully open living and dining zone, master bedroom with ensuite, and an undercover alfresco dining spot, this ideal retreat is only a short journey to parks, schools, and local shopping.
Accommodation: With a great low maintenance sensibility and a terrific open plan design, this outstanding home is in pristine condition, offering up two fantastic living zones including the light-filled central lounge and dining area, as well as the open rumpus room. The airy u-shaped kitchen showcases stainless steel Chef appliances including a dishwasher, while the undercover alfresco meals area and garden will be a hit in summer. The front master bedroom has all the privacy in the world, as well as a quality ensuite and walk-in robe, while the other well-sized bedrooms surround the main bathroom with a private toilet.
Features: Double remote garage, separate laundry with external access, ducted heating, ceiling fans throughout, security door.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Get ready to totally fall in love with the unbelievable outside spaces this perfectly presented Derrimut residence offers. Entertain the masses under the huge pergola area situated off the family room which provides the perfect blend of indoor/outdoor living or enjoy a few quiet drinks in the fantastic gazebo at the rear of the property while the kids enjoy running around the lush and expansive rear yard. Inside has been lovingly maintained and comprises of 3 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR , ensuite and fantastic views of the gorgeous gardens, open plan kitchen overlooking the dining and living area, separate lounge and study or 4th bedroom. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional split system, gas log fireplace, floorboards, down lights, sun blinds, underground watering system, 5000 litre water tank, large storage shed, extensive outdoor lighting and oversize double garage with remote, rear drive though and internal access. All this on a huge block of approximately 670sqm in a quiet cul de sac surrounded by other quality homes. Quite simply a great family home.
